title: I need motivation. I’ve started to write to help with my condition, it’s something to do. I need a little extra help in how to approach writing a book or making a story plan. Can someone help me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Write about yourself with some modifications, write about a person who crossed struggles, and many situations in life and ending up with happiness. Use some creativity, start by writing short quotes and them try to explain briefly then form a story.
